creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Part known issues:
The menu item Options / Choose Language does not change all the displayed text to the new language.
[The behaviour has improved, but language change is still not fully working]

creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
This issue concerns all TestBean components.
When switching from French to English for example , label stay in french

creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Date: Sat Dec  3 17:31:11 2011
New Revision: 1209959

URL: http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?rev=1209959&view=rev
Log:
Bug 52280 - The menu item Options / Choose Language does not change all the displayed text to the new language

Issue is due to the fact that on a french computer, default locale is fr_FR , so as _en bundles are missing it stays in French. Would be the same for all non english computers.
